features: .5-ounce tube of Neosporin + Burn Relief Dual Action Antibiotic Ointment for first aid wound care from the #1 doctor recommended brand
Topical first-aid ointment features a maximum-strength, no-sting formula to help soothe and reduce burn pain of minor wounds, such as cooking burns
Contains the first-aid antibiotics bacitracin zinc, neomycin sulfate & polymyxin B sulfate for 24-hour infection protection for minor cuts, scrapes and burns
The topical burn treatment is also made with pramoxine hydrochloride, an external analgesic for skin burn pain relief

Use this ointment as a wound care essential for any first-aid burn care kit. For best results, clean the affected burn area, apply a small amount of the antibiotic and burn relief ointment 1 to 3 times daily, and cover with a sterile bandage
body.description: Neosporin + Burn Relief Dual Action Ointment is an antibiotic ointment that provides infection protection and helps soothe minor burn pain. Formulated for first aid wound treatment, it contains bacitracin zinc, neomycin sulfate, and polymyxin B sulfate for antibiotic care of minor burns and wounds. The topical analgesic ointment is also formulated with pramoxine hydrochloride to help soothe and reduce burn pain for maximum-strength relief. From the #1 doctor-recommended brand, this antibiotic and pain relief ointment provides maximum strength relief without any sting forburn treatment, including cooking burns. Neosporin + Burn Relief Dual Action Ointment is a wound care essential to include in any burn care first-aid kit.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NEOSPORIN is typically used to treat skin infections and protect wounds from potential infection. NEOSPORIN products treat minor wounds such as scrapes, cuts and light burns. Products are also available to help minimize the appearance of scars, soothe pain and heal chapped lips. How To Use NEOSPORIN: Check the expiration date. Do not use expired productAlways follow the instructions on the label1Wash your hands before and after using NEOSPORINApply a thin layer of your chosen NEOSPORIN to the affected area1 1 to 3 times dailyKeep out of reach of children

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Since it's still a bit hot out here I was afraid of having this shipped but this product was perfect no leaks, cracks, just as advertised and works wonders to soothe burns thankyou!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ointment is greasy and works well with a bandaid.
reviews.reviewText: The cream just rubs in and disappears, good with no bandaid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I always buy name brand neosporin and bandaid brand bandages. I liked the neosporin cream with lidocaine the best. For some reason i haven't been able to find it. I've had generic brands before, they don't work as well for me as the brand name. I burned my arm taking brownies out of the oven. I've burned my arm on the oven before, so didn't think much of it. One day my armed turned beet red and was throbbing a got pretty gross looking. It burned and throbbed. I knew it was infected. 1st thing, i grabbed the neosporin i really covered the area with it and took 2 tylenol. It was so painful. The next morning it looked a tad better and went to the urgent care right below me. The doctor came in and said * how did you do that* i told him. He said how were the brownies. I said amazing. Good thing i went in, he asked if i put anything on it. Bactine 1st then name brand neosporin. He said it was good i put neosporin on it, it could've been worse by morning. I ended up on antibiotics and still put neosporin on the gross area for next 2 days, then the antibiotics kicked in. I will never be without neosporin, not matter what it costs. I never know when I'll need it.I still have scar. I sure am more careful with the oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this for a few days on a canola oil burn on my arm. The speed at which my burn healed without scars proves this product does the job. I already have regular Neosprin, but something about this is different and faster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars REDUCES THE PAIN
reviews.reviewText: I used the product for a burn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is great to help keep a wound from getting infected and does not make the wound sting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great. I didn't buy it for pain relief.
